src.theoreticalspectrum¶

Module Contents¶

class src.theoreticalspectrum.TheoreticalSpectrum(molecules, adducts, modifications=[])¶

This class aims at generating a theoretical spectrum from a list of species

Mix species of different families All possible combinations are extracted

Parameters:

optional: bool

whether this species if optional or not
Returns:
np.ndarray

expand_mix(self, mix)¶

Generates the full list of species from all species rules contained in the mix Maps the masses to all possible names

Returns:
